#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

static unsigned long long res[100001];

int main () {
  unsigned long long i, t, N, T;

  for (i = 4; i <= 100000; i++) {
    res[i] = res[i-1] + ((((i*(i - 3)) >> 1) - ((i - 3) >> 1)) >> 1);
  }

  cin >> T;
  for (t = 1; t <= T; t++) {
    cin >> N;
    cout << res[N] << endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
